review: Some of the Food was excellent, but my chicken was really over cooked and I should have sent it back? However the appetizers were off the charts and filling so I wasn't that hungry. Not sure why the bar runs different drinks prices (cheaper) than when you sit down? They often run promotions and coupons that you can get on your phone - so well worth searching for them on your smart phone while you wait for a table.

This TGI Friday's does what's it's good at and that's a good thing.  There was a 30 min wait, but not wait for the high top tables in the bar. We sauntered up the stairs past the moon man and grabbed a table. Our waiter was very quick an attentive. He even let us use a coupon from our phone - which we weren't expecting. He got a significantly larger tip because of this. I had the Salmon and it was good. I wasn't expecting much and it exceeded my expectations. Also the rice that came with the entree was very good. I'd go back and probably will be back.

I went to tgi  on sun to watch the game. Omg. Yes the game wS on. But. Me and  two friends ordered food I got a salad.  When it came out it had a live roach in it. No joke. When I talked to the manger about this. She comped our food. But by the time we left. I got a bill for 60 dollars.  I was flord   Yes we paid it and have the Waitress $30 tip she then proceeded to bitch and complain about it. I will never go to this place again. Also I had went ther two weeks prior to this and got food to go it was Horrible I ordered chicken Caesar salad and Jack Daniels sampler my salad was put in with the hot food and the chicken was burnt to a Crisp.  Never again
Great, friendly, attentive service at the bar. Good prices on drinks during happy hour or football games. Good food, friendly staff. Overall good experience!
